reviews.review: I hate this game with every existence of my being. No game has left me with more hatred in my heart. I have no left anywhere in my soul as a result of this terrible game. I urge every single person to stay as far away from it humanity possibly. Wish this game only upon your worst enemies and even then you will be a cruel person for punishing them so intensely.
Is the many fun, the killer remind me of uncle who kept me trapt in basement aswell. Would recomend very many memories come from this game

This game is so unique and asymmetric that I have to conclude, I had never played such a game before. It has a really special way of bringing you joy, but it also requires a bit of patience at the beginning, because of the lack of your skill and campy/toxic players that can sometimes show up in the "trial". It can be sometimes scary as well, so be prepared xD.

P.S. If you are frustrated with it, I recommend playing it with your friends 
Please forgive me for my english, I am not a pro yet :D

The game is fun and challenging the problem is with the INTENSE moneygrabbing of the publisher that limit you to so few killers and survivors unless you spend real cash in game. Couple that with some that you literally cant unlock without spending cash and the fact that they're having a HUGE saving at the moment of 10% on some store items.. its just clearly a huge money tap that they wont be turning off any time soon. But i am enjoying the game. just would like content to be earnable instead of even with 58 hours played i havent earned enough in game shards to unlock 1 killer or survivor with in game currency.. gg money hungry

This game was not designed, it appeared. The game is balanced as if it is a 1v4, it is in fact a series of 1v1s in which one of the players has objectively better abilities than the other. I only feel pain playing this stupid game, DO NOT BUY.

I love this game and hate it at the same time. because it's fun with friends, pumps you up while a killer is chasing you but this bullshit piece of shit game also is so annoying to play so much to learn about perks and how to loop, pallet drop, flashlight everything. 10/10 would recommend with friends and to beat your monitor into pieces

Although you may feel a little horrified seeing the nature and surrounding and gameplay of this game but according to me it needs much more diversification. It lacks variety/ Although the concept is good. More brutalization is required and there should be more ways of escaping.
